name: Dang Thi Quynh Huong
tagline: Turning Ideas Into Words That Convert
bio: I'm a passionate copywriter and content creator with a proven track record of helping businesses transform their ideas into compelling content that drives results. With expertise across multiple industries and writing styles, I bring a strategic approach to every project.
experience: With over 5 years of experience in copywriting and content creation, I've helped 50+ businesses across various industries improve their content strategy and increase conversions. My work spans from small startups to Fortune 500 companies, always focused on delivering measurable results.
approach: I believe great copywriting starts with understanding your audience and their pain points. My approach combines strategic thinking with creative execution, ensuring every piece of content serves a purpose and drives your business forward. I work closely with clients to understand their brand voice and goals, then create content that resonates with their target audience.
